hero.subheadline: AirWatt rectennas convert radio waves into clean, usable electricity—anywhere. Unleashing the potential of batteryless IoT and remote sensing.

about.description_1: At AirWatt, we are pioneering the next generation of wireless energy. Our rectenna technology captures ambient and directed radio frequency waves, converting them into continuous, clean DC power.
about.description_2: We eliminate the need for batteries in billions of IoT devices, reducing e-waste and enabling truly maintenance-free smart environments.

efficiency.title: High-Efficiency Harvesting
efficiency.description: Proprietary rectenna circuits designed to capture RF energy with minimal loss.

beamforming.title: Smart Beamforming
beamforming.description: Intelligent energy routing to target devices dynamically.

scalability.title: Global Scalability
scalability.description: Built for mass deployment in industrial and consumer IoT ecosystems.

technology.title: Core Technology
technology.subtitle: Built on years of research in metamaterials and RF engineering.

conversion.title: RF-to-DC Conversion
conversion.subtitle: Ultra-Low Loss Circuits
conversion.description: Our patented diode configurations achieve industry-leading conversion efficiency, even at low power densities.

beamforming.title: Beamforming Arrays
beamforming.subtitle: Precision Power Delivery
beamforming.description: Phased array antennas focus energy beams directly to receivers, maximizing range and minimizing waste.

transfer.title: Long-Range Transfer
transfer.subtitle: Extended Coverage
transfer.description: Power sensors and devices up to 30 meters away, enabling true room-scale and warehouse-scale wireless power.

products.title: Rectenna Series
products.subtitle: Scalable solutions for every power requirement.
products.order_subtitle: Fill in your details to purchase

contact.title: Partner With Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to integrate wireless power into your product? Let's talk.
